text: Life Is a Miracle () is a 2004 Serbian Montenegrin French Italian war musical comedy drama movie directed by Emir Kusturica and starring Slavko Štimac, Nataša Šolak, Vesna Trivalić, Goran Jevtić, Vuk Kostić, Aleksandar Berček. ==Other websites== * * Category:2004 comedy-drama movies Category:2004 musical movies Category:2000s war movies Category:Serbian movies Category:Montenegrin movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French musical movies Category:French drama movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Italian musical movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Emir Kusturica
title: Life Is a Miracle
